pages.text: $(#551012)I awaken abruptly, disoriented and confused. The heat is overwhelming, and the air is thick with the stench of sulfur and ash. A strange sense of urgency pushes me to move. I don't know where it's coming from but it feels... $(italics)relentless.$()

$(#551012)Survival instincts kick inâ€”I need to gather and craft basic equipment from the environment. The mushrooms scattered around look edible, and there might be some food in the trees as well. I have no idea why I'm here, but perhaps I can piece together the mystery. Glancing at my right wrist, I notice a red eye etched into my skin. On my left wrist, a scar spells out "ASCEND". Is that my handwriting?
